Title: Relates to requiring immunization information systems to record data on the number of vaccine exemptions reported by each health care provider
Summary: Requires immunization information systems to record data on the number of vaccine exemptions reported by each health care provider.
LawCode: Amd ยง2168, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring immunization information systems to record data on the number of vaccine exemptions reported by each health care provider
